item.title: Some softwares I use
item.description: Some softwares I use 1 OS Ubuntu 22.04 Microsoft Window 7, 10 (seldom) 2 Web browser Google chrome Firefox Opera 3 IDEs VS Code Code-Server - Browser based VS Code IDE 4 Database clients DBeaver MySQL client console PSQL console 5 Chat clients Telegram Zalo Skype 6 Online services Google suite: https://gmail.com Dropbox Project management Trello - Jira: https://www.atlassian.com/ Mindmap: https://gitmind.com/ 7 Others Laradock Nginx PHP 7, 8 MySQL PostgreSQL 12 TimeScaleDB 2.
